content: I tried to upgrade community.fhir.org and it has failed because of something to do with postgre version, and I have no idea how to rescue it. it's running discourse inside a docker container on ubuntu. I'm not familiar with linux or docker or discourse, and the documentation and support is hopelessly confusing to me. If you're familiar with this kind of system and can help, can you contact me privately - thanks
yes. found the magic character to change (with help from discourse community)
